original_title: En el futuro... Predicciones para un presente extremo
overview: “If we vanished tomorrow, no organism on this planet would miss us. Nothing in nature needs us”. María Cañas meets the Anthropocene in this search-footage film starring the animals that (hopefully) will take over the world when the most harmful species (the human one) materializes its own destruction.
title: In the Future... Predictions for an Extreme Present
